sentences: Berta Johanna Amalie Bock née Spech (15 March 1857 – 4 April 1945) was a Romanian composer.
She was born in Hermannstadt, Transylvania (now Sibiu, Romania) and also taught piano and voice.
She was born in Hermannstadt, Transylvania (now Sibiu, Romania) and also taught piano and voice. She died in Sibiu.
